text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Back to having a very vocal liar as a press secretary. This should be fun. You were such a trump sycophant when you were on @CNN. Nothing surprises me w/ you. Look, trump was golfing & said #COVID19 was a hoax. Why even say otherwise.  🙏🏻@ProjectLincoln https://t.co/HIm5pIHxDf
